name: Khmer
uniqueText:
When creating a Holy site, Gain control over all tiles in a 1-tile radius
Holy sites generate additional cultural output equal to 50% of their belief output
Each holy site provides +1 Faith to adjacent tiles
+1 Production, +1 Food from every Holy site with 3 to 6 neighboring Improvement tiles
+1 Production, +1 Food from every Holy site with 6 to 7 neighboring Improvement tiles
uniques: [+5 Culture] from [Holy site] tiles [in all cities]
[+1 Culture] from every [resource] <in [Tundra] tiles> <in [Holy site] tiles>
[+1 Culture] from every [resource] <in [Snow] tiles> <in [Holy site] tiles>
[+1 Culture] from every [{Holy site} {Fresh Water}] <in tiles adjacent to [City center] tiles>
[+1 Culture] from every [Volcanic Soil] <in [Holy site] tiles>
[+2 Culture] from every [Geothermal Crevice] <in [Holy site] tiles>
[+4 Culture] from [Holy site] tiles [in all cities] <after discovering [Worship]>
[+1 Production, +1 Food] from every [Holy site] <with [3] to [6] neighboring [Improvement] tiles>
[+1 Production, +1 Food] from every [Holy site] <with [6] to [7] neighboring [Improvement] tiles>
[-5]% Strength <for [Military] units> <vs [Byzantium] units> <after founding a religion> <before enhancing a religion>
[-10]% Strength <for [Military] units> <vs [Byzantium] units> <after enhancing a religion>

name: Mali
uniques: [+1 Faith, +1 Food] [in all cities] <for every adjacent [Desert]>
[-1 Production, +3 Gold] from [Mine] tiles [in all cities]
May buy [Gold] buildings with [Faith] for [3] times their normal Production cost
[-30]% Production when constructing [All] units [in all cities]
[-30]% Production when constructing [All] buildings [in all cities]
[-5]% Strength <for [Military] units> <vs [Byzantium] units> <after founding a religion> <before enhancing a religion>
[-10]% Strength <for [Military] units> <vs [Byzantium] units> <after enhancing a religion>
